unnormalised: Film festivals are back in full swing, yaar! After a bit of a lull, cinephiles are rejoicing. The prestigious Kolkata International Film Festival just wrapped up with a bang, showcasing independent films alongside Bollywood blockbusters.
normalised: Film festivals are back in full swing, yaar! After a bit of a lull, cinephiles are rejoicing. The prestigious Kolkata International Film Festival just wrapped up with a bang, showcasing independent films alongside Bollywood blockbusters.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Cannes selection committee is eyeing several promising Indian entries this year, including a heartwarming tale set in Kerala during Onam. Expect lots of vibrant colours and maybe even a biryani cameo!
normalised: Word on the street is that the Cannes selection committee is eyeing several promising Indian entries this year, including a heartwarming tale set in Kerala during Onam. Expect lots of vibrant colours and maybe even a biryani cameo!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the Dharamshala International Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition, promising a stunning backdrop and a platform for emerging filmmakers. It's a chance to see movies you won't find at your local multiplex.
normalised: Meanwhile, the Dharamshala International Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition, promising a stunning backdrop and a platform for emerging filmmakers. It's a chance to see movies you won't find at your local multiplex.

unnormalised: Beyond the big names, smaller regional festivals are popping up too, celebrating local stories and talent. So, grab some popcorn and get ready to discover your next favourite film!
normalised: Beyond the big names, smaller regional festivals are popping up too, celebrating local stories and talent. So, grab some popcorn and get ready to discover your next favourite film!
